event.name: postbuild
event.description: Copying program files to install directory

event.name: postbuild
event.command: copyFiles7.bat $(PlatformName) installProj.bat libdbxml25 dll $(OutDir) debug copyLib
copyFiles7.bat $(PlatformName) installProj.bat libdbxml25 dll $(OutDir) release copyLib

event.name: custom
event.command: mkdir "./$(OutDir)/classes/dummy" "./../build_windows/dummy" echo compiling Berkeley DB XML Java classes javac -source 1.5 -target 1.5 -g -d $(OutDir)/classes -classpath $(OutDir)/classes;$(OutDir)/classes.db;../build_windows/db.jar ../src/java/com/sleepycat/dbxml/*.java ../src/java/com/sleepycat/db/*.java echo creating dbxml jar file cd "$(OutDir)/classes" jar cf ../../../../build_windows/dbxml.jar com/sleepycat/dbxml/*.class com/sleepycat/db/*.class echo compiling Berkeley DB XML Java examples cd ../../.. javac -source 1.5 -target 1.5 -g -d $(OutDir)/classes -classpath ../build_windows/dbxml.jar;$(OutDir)/dbxml.jar;$(OutDir)/classes;$(OutDir)/classes.db;../build_windows/db.jar ../examples/java/gettingStarted/*.java ../examples/java/basic/*.java ../examples/java/event/*.java ../examples/java/misc/*.java echo creating example jar file cd "$(OutDir)/classes" jar cf ../../../../build_windows/dbxmlexamples.jar dbxml/gettingStarted/*.class basic/*.class event/*.class misc/*.class cd ../../.. rmdir "$(OutDir)/classes/dummy" "./../build_windows/dummy" echo Java build finished

event.name: postbuild
event.description: Copying .jar and library files to install directory

event.name: postbuild
event.description: Copying library files to install directory

event.name: postbuild
event.description: Copying library files to install directory

event.name: postbuild
event.description: Copying library files to install directory

event.name: postbuild
event.description: Copying library files to install directory

event.name: postbuild
event.description: Copying library files to install directory

event.name: custom
event.command: mkdir "./$(OutDir)/classes.db/dummy" "./../build_windows/dummy.db" echo compiling Berkeley DB Java classes javac -source 1.5 -target 1.5 -g -d $(OutDir)/classes.db -classpath $(OutDir)/classes.db ../../db-4.8.26/java/src/com/sleepycat/db/*.java ../../db-4.8.26/java/src/com/sleepycat/db/internal/*.java ../../db-4.8.26/java/src/com/sleepycat/bind/*.java ../../db-4.8.26/java/src/com/sleepycat/bind/serial/*.java ../../db-4.8.26/java/src/com/sleepycat/bind/tuple/*.java ../../db-4.8.26/java/src/com/sleepycat/collections/*.java ../../db-4.8.26/java/src/com/sleepycat/compat/*.java ../../db-4.8.26/java/src/com/sleepycat/util/*.java ../../db-4.8.26/java/src/com/sleepycat/util/keyrange/*.java echo creating db jar file jar cf ../build_windows/db.jar -C $(OutDir)/classes.db . rmdir "$(OutDir)/classes.db/dummy" "./../build_windows/dummy.db" echo Java build finished

event.name: postbuild
event.description: Copying .jar and library files to install directory
